title: I got accused of scripting by this "Riot" employee
body:
So just another day of playing zed in ranked this time.I went 5/0 in lane and used that as my advantage to gank other lanes and help them out.Now when I ganked bot lane there was this jinx and morgana.I dodged every single of their skillshots (e and q) and jinx didn't say anything and just acknowledged that i'm pretty good at side stepping or so I thought.Around mid game where I killed her and morgana solo at top lane she started accusing me of scripting as I sidestepped every single one of their skillshots. So the chat went like this:
J (Jinx) Z(Zed)
J: That spacebar working well aye zed
Z: Huh why?
J: Ur evading everything
Z: Evade?
J: What's evading?!?!?
Z: I'm not scripting lol
......

Too many to put in here.She accused me of scripting till the end of the game and also claimed to work with Riot Company.
Jinx said they recruited her! LMAO


Anyyway her name is:
nofreddybecool


I'm just here to say that I don't script just incase rito actually gets a report from her lmao

She threatend to ban me as well {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Mate, if they were a Rioter it's more than likely you'd have been banned already, clearly they have no affiliation with Riot whatsoever. Just send in a support ticket (via the support link at the top of the page) and Riot will take care of it, probably in the manner of a perma-ban for said "Jinx".

And hey, if people are calling you a scripter because they can't handle you (and not because you *may have* used a script) be happy, it's the best compliment you can get in gaming. I used to get accused of scripting and hacking all the time when I played Quinn before 5.22, and it was always by a Yi. They just didn't realise Quinn is a hard counter to Yi and kept feeding me.

I've been called those heaps of times but i know that I've never touched a program or anything that does that have no clue what programs it uses and its sad people go straight to "Scripter" or "Hacker".. Like I've seen scripters like a syndra the other day no wards no nothing to see me as playing jungle skarner come out of mid lane bush and instant like no time delay straight away q e to stop me like if i was playing i wouldn't have that good of a reaction to do it like instant that is clearly scripting. So yeah dw about people like that they are just talking smack and clearly have no idea and goes straight to the Scripter excuse to miss skill shots. :)
